alert.note: Alert for Merrimack; Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sullivan, south central Grafton and northwestern Merrimack Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New London, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, New London, Grafton, Enfield, Canaan, Danbury, Groton, Newport, Warner, Bristol, Grantham, Andover, Alexandria, Hill, Goshen, Croydon, Hebron, Newbury, Wilmot and Sulton. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 25 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
